00019 #ifndef ALIGNMENTS_FROM_RESULTS_FILE_HEADER_FILE
00020 #define ALIGNMENTS_FROM_RESULTS_FILE_HEADER_FILE
00021 
00022 namespace SimSite3D{
00023 
00025 
00029 class AlignmentsFromResultsFile{
00030 public:
00032   AlignmentsFromResultsFile(const std::string res_fname)
00033   { 
00034     A_res_fname = res_fname; 
00035   }
00036 
00038   virtual ~AlignmentsFromResultsFile()
00039   { ; }
00040 
00042   template<typename align_T> bool
00043   align(ModelSitemap *query_site, Sitemap& dset_site, 
00044         std::vector<align_T> *alignments)
00045   {
00046     std::ifstream res_file;
00047     if(!open_ifstream(res_file, A_res_fname)) return false;
00048 
00049     std::string dset_struct_id = dset_site.get_struct_id();
00050     for(std::string line; std::getline(res_file, line); ){
00051       if(line[0] == '#' || line.length() == 0) continue;
00052 
00053       std::vector<std::string> toks;
00054       string_tok(line, &toks, '|');
00055      
00056       std::string line_struct_id = toks[0];
00057       size_t pos = toks[0].rfind("_f.mol2");
00058       if(pos != std::string::npos) line_struct_id = toks[0].substr(0, pos);
00059       if(line_struct_id != dset_struct_id) continue;
00060 
00061       // NOTE: the matrices written in the results file are for multiplying
00062       // each position from the left.  HOWEVER, in SimSite3D the matrices are 
00063       // the transpose of those written in the results file as the rotation 
00064       // matrices are premultiplied by the coordinates (in other words the
00065       // coordinates are multiplied by rotation matrices from the right inside 
00066       // of SimSite3D).
00067 
00068       if(toks.size() < 4){
00069         std::cerr << "Too few fields in the alignment from " << A_res_fname 
00070                   << "\n" << "offending line: \"" << line << "\"" << std::endl;
00071         continue;
00072       }
00073 
00074       std::vector<std::string> R_toks, T_toks;
00075       string_tok(toks[2], &R_toks, ' ');
00076       string_tok(toks[3], &T_toks, ' ');
00077       if(R_toks.size() != 9 || T_toks.size() != 3){
00078         std::cerr << "Could not read the transformation from " << A_res_fname 
00079                   << "\n" << "offending line: \"" << line << "\"" << std::endl;
00080         continue;
00081       }
00082 
00083       align_T tmp_align;
00084       bool failed = false;
00085       for(int i = 0; i < 3 && !failed; ++i)
00086         for(int j = 0; j < 3 && !failed; ++j)
00087           if(!my_strtod(R_toks[3*i + j], &(tmp_align.R[3*j+i]))){
00088             std::cerr << "Could not read the rotation from " 
00089                       << A_res_fname << "\n" << "offending line: \"" << line 
00090                       << "\"" << std::endl;
00091             failed = true;
00092           }
00093 
00094       for(int i = 0; i < 3 && !failed; ++i)
00095         if(!my_strtod(T_toks[i], &(tmp_align.T[i]))){
00096           std::cerr << "Could not read the translation from " 
00097                     << A_res_fname << "\n" << "offending line: \"" << line 
00098                     << "\"" << std::endl;
00099           failed = true;
00100         }
00101 
00102       if(!failed) alignments->push_back(tmp_align);
00103     }
00104     return true;
00105   }
00106 
00107 private:
00108   std::string A_res_fname;
00109 };
00110 } // end namespace SimSite3D
00111 #endif
